questions.question_text: Which two services define cloud networks? (Choose two)

questions.answer_ET: D. Follow directions from the security appliance manufacturer to remediate a vulnerability

discussion.content: A. Implement rules to prevent a vulnerability

questions.answer: D. Follow directions from the security appliance manufacturer to remediate a vulnerability

choices.B: Reduce the severity of a vulnerability

questions.question_text: In a security context, which action can you take to address compliance?
What can the SMTP preprocessor in a FirePOWER normalize?
questions.answer_ET: E. It can forward the SMTP traffic to an email filter server

discussion.content: Yes, C is the correct answer, Ref: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/security/firepower/60/configuration/guide/fpmc-config-guide-v60/Application_Layer_Preprocessors.html#ID-2244-00000b49

questions.answer: E. It can forward the SMTP traffic to an email filter server

choices.B: It uses the Traffic Anomaly Detector
choices.D: It compares known threats to the email sender
choices.A: It can look up the email sender
choices.C: It can extract and decode email attachments in client to server traffic

questions.question_text: You want to allow all of your companies users to access the internet without allowing other Web servers to collect the IP addresses of individual users. What two solutions can you use? (Choose two)

choices.A: Install a Web content filter to hid users local IP addresses
choices.C: Assign the same IP addresses to all users
choices.D: Configure a proxy server to hide users local IP addresses
choices.B: Configure a firewall to use Port Address Translation

questions.answer: E. Assign unique IP addresses to all users
questions.answer_ET: E. Assign unique IP addresses to all users
